00020 int MakeDetectorPulses::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00021   std::string fast_det_name;
00022   std::string slow_det_name;
00023   AnalysedPulseList *slow_pulses;
00024   AnalysedPulseList *fast_pulses;
00025   StringAnalPulseMap::iterator current;
00026   //DetectorPulseList *detectorPulses;
00027 
00028   // Loop through paired channels
00029   for (ChannelPairing_t::iterator it_det = fFastSlowPairs.begin();
00030                   it_det != fFastSlowPairs.end(); it_det++) {
00031     // find the list of analyzed pulses for this channel
00032     if(it_det->second.first!="") {
00033       current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(it_det->second.first);
00034       if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00035         std::cout<<"Unable to find channel for detector: "<<it_det->second.first<<std::endl;
00036         return 1;
00037       }
00038       fast_pulses=&(current->second);
00039     }else{
00040       fast_pulses=NULL;
00041     }
00042 
00043     if(it_det->second.second!="") {
00044       current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(it_det->second.second);
00045       if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00046         std::cout<<"Unable to find channel for detector: "<<it_det->second.second<<std::endl;
00047         return 2;
00048       }
00049       slow_pulses=&(current->second);
00050     }else{
00051       slow_pulses=NULL;
00052     }
00053 
00054     fGenerator->ProcessPulses(gSetup,it_det->first,fast_pulses,slow_pulses,gDetectorPulseMap[it_det->first]);
00055   }
00056   return 0;
00057 }
00058 
00059 std::string MakeDetectorPulses::GetDetectorName(std::string in_name){
00060    if (*(in_name.end() -1)  == 'F' || *(in_name.end() -1)  == 'S' ){
00061         in_name.resize(in_name.length()-2);
00062         return in_name;
00063    } 
00064    return in_name;
00065 }
00066 
00067 std::string MakeDetectorPulses::GetOtherChannelName(std::string in_name,std::string det_name){
00068     if(det_name=="") det_name=GetDetectorName(in_name);
00069 
00070     if(in_name==det_name) return "";
00071 
00072     if (TSetupData::IsFast(in_name)){
00073        return det_name+"-S";
00074     }
00075     return det_name+"-F";
00076 }
00077 
00078 int MakeDetectorPulses::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, TSetupData* setup){
00079   // Set up the generator
00080   fGenerator=MakeGenerator(fAlgorithm);
00081   if(!fGenerator) return 1;
00082 
00083   // Now pair up all channels
00084   std::string det_name_a, det_name_b,det_name;
00085   bool det_a_isFast;
00086   //bool det_b_isSlow;
00087 
00088   // Find all fast detectors
00089   for (StringAnalPulseMap::iterator channel = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00090                   channel != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); channel++) {
00091       // get the detector name which is the common part of the fast and slow channel names
00092       det_name_a=channel->first;
00093       det_name=GetDetectorName(det_name);
00094       if(fFastSlowPairs.find(det_name) != fFastSlowPairs.end() ) continue;
00095       det_name_b=GetOtherChannelName(det_name_a,det_name);
00096 
00097       det_a_isFast=TSetupData::IsFast(det_name_a);
00098       //det_b_isSlow=TSetupData::IsSlow(det_name_b);
00099 
00100       if(det_a_isFast) {
00101          fFastSlowPairs[det_name]=std::make_pair(det_name_a,det_name_b);
00102       }else{
00103          fFastSlowPairs[det_name]=std::make_pair(det_name_b,det_name_a);
00104       }
00105 
00106   }
00107 
00108   for( ChannelPairing_t::iterator i=fFastSlowPairs.begin();i!=fFastSlowPairs.end();i++){
00109     std::cout<<i->first<<'\t'<<i->second.first<<'\t'<<i->second.second<<std::endl;
00110   }
00111   return 0;
00112 }

00114 TVDetectorPulseGenerator* MakeDetectorPulses::MakeGenerator(const std::string& generatorType){
00115     // Select the generator type
00116     TVDetectorPulseGenerator* generator=TDPGeneratorFactory::Instance()->createModule(generatorType);
00117     // As we develop newer techniques we can add to the list here
00118     if (!generator){
00119         return NULL;
00120     }
00121     // setup some options on the generator
00122     generator->SetDebug(Debug());
00123     return generator;
00124 }
